channel.title: Need basic moparscape commands =\
channel.description:
alright so i just recently downloaded moparscape and i got how to spawn npc's and pickup items and stuff but some things i can't figure out is how to give the npc's drops and how to give them hp because when i attack them i just hit a zero and they die... also idk but i think it's just my computer but i want to download some of the mod clients that other players have made but for some reason i can save the file but when i try to open them it just comes to a blank page that says it can't open it and goes back to asking me to save or open the file....
please and thanks =P
and yes i realise i'm a noob -.-[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2007, 12:41:11 AM[/size][hr].......

item.title: Need basic moparscape commands =\
item.dc:creator: @steroidpkin steroidpkin
item.description:
@steroidpkin wrote:

alright so i just recently downloaded moparscape and i got how to spawn npc’s and pickup items and stuff but some things i can’t figure out is how to give the npc’s drops and how to give them hp because when i attack them i just hit a zero and they die… also idk but i think it’s just my computer but i want to download some of the mod clients that other players have made but for some reason i can save the file but when i try to open them it just comes to a blank page that says it can’t open it and goes back to asking me to save or open the file…

please and thanks =P
